translation: I think Yoga is hard to be attained by one with an uncontrolled self, but the self-controlled and striving one can attain it by the appropriate means.
commentary: 6.36 by a man of uncontrolled self? Yoga: Yoga? Dushprapah hard to attain? It is thus? May My? Mati: opinion? by the selfcontrolled one? You but? Effort by the striving one? possible: possible? avaptum to obtain? Upayatah by (proper) means.Commentary Uncontrolled self he who has not controlled the senses and the mind by the constant practice of dispassion and meditation. Selfcontrolled
